net.derquinse.common.base

Class Digests

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.derquinse.common.base.NotInstantiable
      • net.derquinse.common.base.Digests

  • public final class Digests
extends NotInstantiable
    Utility class for dealing with message digests.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez

                                 throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - Digest algorithm.
        Returns:
        A Digest object that implements the specified algorithm.
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the algorithm is not available in the caller's environment.
